history.proof: intros z z1 z2 H H0. apply Z.quot_unique_exact in H. - symmetry. qauto use: Z.mul_comm, Z.quot_mul, Z.add_0_l. - apply H0.

ctx: intros z z1 z2 H H0.
exceptions.tactic: apply Z.mul_reg_r with (p:= z) in H.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall n m p : Z, p <> 0 -> n * p = m * p -> n = m" on hypothesis of type "z * z1 = z * z2".

ctx: intros z z1 z2 H H0.
exceptions.exn: The reference Z.quot_unique_apply was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros z z1 z2 H H0.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros z z1 z2 H H0. apply Z.mul_reg_r with (p:= z) in H. apply Z.quot_unique_apply in H. - symmetry. auto. - apply H0.
